ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns
ygData.msgSnippet: The  gate has always been there. Just click it on a bar and it opens, same as any other door. ... From: mlockridge01  To:
ygData.messageBody:
The gate has always been there. Just click it on a bar and it opens, same
as any other door.
----- Original Message -----
From: mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 24, 2003 4:08 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns


> I have never done Crystal Caverns. So, I wearied of mugging Frost
> Giants in various locations, and went looking for something
> interesting to do solo. I first returned to some favorite haunts where
> I knew Hill Giants were and took a few of those. A bit more profitable
> than Frost Giants, but not so interesting that I spent much time
> hunting them.
>
> So, I decided to try CC. Went to the Rygor fortress, and found the
> little building at the back. Could see the "snowball" inside, but an
> iron bar gate was blocking the doorway. I had never heard of this
> being there. Anyone know what is up? Was I just not fully informed, or
> is this gate something new?
>
> Barto
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com

>
>
